description: This pleasant riverside walk takes you along the River Dee in the attractive town of Banchory in Aberdeenshire. On the way there's attractive woodland and wildlife such as otters and herons to look out for. To continue your walking in the area you could visit the nearby Falls of Feugh where you can watch the salmon leaping up the cascade. The town is also located near the stunning Cairngorms National Park where there are numerous walking options. Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Banchory. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
